alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/... At 1255 PM EDT/1155 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Wewahitchka, or 12 miles northeast of Port St. Joe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Overstreet, Cairo, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Chipola Park, Wetappo, Dalkeith and Majette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
